#include<iostream>
using namespace std;
typedef long long int INT;
int main()
{
    INT t;
    cin>>t;
    while(t--)
    {
        INT t,p,i,j,n,sentinel;
        double r=1;
        cin>>t>>p;
        n=t-p;
        if(n<=p)
            sentinel=n;
        else
            sentinel=p;
        j=sentinel;
        i=t;
        while(j>=1)
        {
            r*=double((double)i/(double)j);
            j--;i--;
        }
        cout<<(INT)r<<endl;
    }
 return 0;
}
